description.jp:
ガストラ帝国の英才教育を受けた軍人。
幼いころに魔導の力を植えつけられて
以来 常勝将軍として数々の武勲を
打ち立ててきたが やがて戦争の愚かさ
に疑問を抱き 帝国に謀反。ロックとの
出会いをきっかけに「リターナー」の
一員となり ケフカと対峙した。
description.gl: A gifted and specially trained military woman of the Gestahlian Empire. Imbued with magical energy at a young age、 she would go on to win countless battles as an undefeated general. In time、 however、 she came to question the foolishness of war and rebelled against the empire. After meeting Locke、 she joined the Returners in their fight against Kefka.

jp.text: 私とて軍人のはしくれ \nそう簡単に心を動かしたりはしない！
そ そんな！私は帝国将軍よ\nそんなチャラチャラしたこと\nできるわけないでしょ！
うそ……うそよ！\n冗談だって言ってよ！！
もう 希望は絶たれてしまったと\n思っていたけど\n諦めちゃいけないわね
こんな世界だからこそ\n夢を追わなければならないんじゃない？
なんか違うな？ え？ \nゴメンちゃーい

gl.text: Thanks for your concern、 but I'm a soldier、 not some love-starved twit.
H-hold on here! I'm a former general、 not some opera floozy!
No! ...No!!! Tell me you're just joking!
I'd given up hope... But...I was wrong!
If you need a dream to chase after、 then why don't you find yourself a new one?
Oops... That wasn't it、 was it? Sorry!

desc.en:
When called for assistance, Celes performs the following actions
• Raises own Max BRV by 70%
• Increases party's BRV by 100% Initial BRV
• All targets: 2 turns [Lock]
• 2-HIT magic BRV attack + HP attack
• Raises caller's BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt

3 turns Call effect after use
• Caller: [BRV Magic Absorb]
desc.gl:
Celes's ability when called:
 • Largely raises MAX BRV
 • Grants party BRV based on own INT BRV
 • All targets: 2 turns Lock
 • 2-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
 • Increases BRV of character who called Celes by 30% of HP damage dealt

Grants BRV Magic Absorb to character who called Celes for 3 turns after use

desc.en:
3-HIT Ice AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack
　+ 8-HIT Ice AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
Deals split HP damage to all targets
Recovers Party's HP by 50% total HP damage dealt (limit 35% of Max HP)
Increases Party's BRV by 20% total HP damage dealt
All targets: 4 turns [Ice Resist Down] on first HP attack
All targets: 3 turns [Magitek Ice], 4 turns [Lock]
Self: Active [BRV Magic Absorb] duration +1, level +2 (limit 5)

[Magitek Ice] debuff triggers [Magitek Ice] trap after afflicted target's turn
　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% Initial BRV

　∟ Recovers Party's HP by 20% HP damage dealt (limit 10% Max HP)
　∟ Increases Party's BRV by 20% HP damage dealt
　∟ Cannot initiate [Chase]
